description: Executor to build and deploy aws sam

flavor.description: The flavor to run from the flavors object

flavors.description: The different flavors to deploy, keyed by the flavor name and value is the firebase project id

skipBuild.description: Will not auto build before deploying

templateFile.description: The template file to use for deployment

stackNames.description: The different stack names to deploy, keyed by the flavor name and value is the stack name

verbose.description: Whether to run the command with verbose logging
